mapper.insert: INSERT INTO oa_bus_page_detail ( i_bus_page_id, i_bus_function_id, s_busdata_table, s_table_column, s_column_name, i_is_listtitle, i_is_listquery, i_check_is_null, s_check_expjava, s_check_expsql, s_check_expjs, s_check_showmsg, s_send_key, s_archives_key, i_is_default, i_set_type, s_column_remarks ) VALUES ( #{iBusPageId}, #{iBusFunctionId}, #{sBusdataTable}, #{sTableColumn}, #{sColumnName}, #{iIsListtitle}, #{iIsListquery}, #{iCheckIsNull}, #{sCheckExpjava}, #{sCheckExpsql}, #{sCheckExpjs}, #{sCheckShowmsg}, #{sSendKey}, #{sArchivesKey}, #{iIsDefault}, #{iSetType}, #{sColumnRemarks} )

INSERT INTO oa_bus_page_detail ( i_bus_page_id, i_bus_function_id, s_busdata_table, s_table_column, s_dict_id, s_column_name, i_is_listtitle, i_is_listquery, i_check_is_null, s_check_expjava, s_check_expsql, i_check_expjs, s_check_showmsg, s_send_key, s_archives_key, i_is_default, s_column_remarks ) VALUES
( #{iPageId}, #{functionId}, #{tableName}, #{batchCode.sTableColumn}, #{batchCode.sDictId}, #{batchCode.sColumnName}, #{batchCode.iIsListtitle}, #{batchCode.iIsListquery}, #{batchCode.iCheckIsNull}, #{batchCode.sCheckExpjava}, #{batchCode.sCheckExpsql}, #{batchCode.sCheckExpjs}, #{batchCode.sCheckShowmsg}, #{batchCode.sSendKey}, #{batchCode.sArchivesKey}, #{batchCode.iIsDefault}, #{batchCode.sColumnRemarks} )

INSERT INTO oa_bus_page_detail ( `i_bus_page_id`, `i_bus_function_id`, `s_busdata_table`, `s_table_column`, `i_order`, `s_dict_id`, `s_dict_sql_key`, `s_column_name`, `i_column_type`, `i_is_listtitle`, `i_is_listquery`, `i_is_esquery`, `i_check_is_null`, `s_check_expjava`, `s_check_expsql`, `i_check_expjs`, `s_check_showmsg`, `s_send_key`, `s_archives_key`, `s_mark_key`, `i_is_default`, `s_column_remarks` ) (select `i_bus_page_id`, #{newId}, `s_busdata_table`, `s_table_column`, `i_order`, `s_dict_id`, `s_dict_sql_key`, `s_column_name`, `i_column_type`, `i_is_listtitle`, `i_is_listquery`, `i_is_esquery`, `i_check_is_null`, `s_check_expjava`, `s_check_expsql`, `i_check_expjs`, `s_check_showmsg`, `s_send_key`, `s_archives_key`, `s_mark_key`, `i_is_default`, `s_column_remarks` from oa_bus_page_detail d where d.i_bus_function_id = #{oldId} )
mapper.select: select * from oa_bus_page_detail where i_bus_function_id=#{iBusFunctionId} and i_is_listquery = 1

select s_table_column,s_column_name from oa_bus_page_detail c where c.i_bus_function_id = #{functionId} and c.i_bus_page_id = #{iPageId} and c.i_is_listtitle = 1 order by if(ISNULL(i_order),1,0),i_order ,i_id asc
select * from oa_bus_page_detail c where c.i_bus_function_id = #{functionId} and c.i_bus_page_id = #{iPageId} order by if(ISNULL(i_order),1,0),i_order ,i_id asc
select * from oa_bus_page_detail c where c.i_bus_function_id = #{functionId} and c.i_bus_page_id = #{iPageId} order by if(ISNULL(i_order),1,0),i_order ,i_id asc
select * from oa_bus_page_detail c where c.s_busdata_table = #{tableName} and c.i_bus_function_id = #{functionId} and c.i_is_listtitle = 1
select * from oa_bus_page_detail c where c.i_bus_function_id = #{functionId} and c.i_bus_page_id = #{iPageId} ;
